Text: I know first hand how hard it is to find quality, affordable child care. I wouldn't have made it without help from my Aunt Bee but not everyone has family to turn to. It's why I'm fighting for universal child care & higher wages for child care workers. #CareCantWait https://t.co/u5qLoRHPCl

Republican Senators finally unveiled their plan: raise taxes on half of Americans.

But billionaires and giant corporations continue to get a free pass.

It’s deeply unfair to working people — and Democrats won’t let it happen. https://t.co/9qUWJsGzDp

To compete globally, the United States must invest in American workers and manufacturing.

We’re urging @SenSchumer and @SpeakerPelosi to include the strongest trade provisions to support U.S. workers and level the playing field in the final legislation. https://t.co/8JLZwb6SGn

The Wall Street Journal is exposing how giant corporations are using inflation to expand their profit margins.

CEOs are bragging about using their market power to raise prices above their costs and making inflation worse for American families.
https://t.co/zTZgcJIEW7

Big accounting firms send their lawyers to the @USTreasury to write tax loopholes for their corporate clients. Those employees then cash-in on their service.

@RepJayapal & I confirmed this revolving door. Inspector General must investigate these schemes. https://t.co/vtLGuo7xAA

I support @POTUS imposing sanctions for Putin's invasion of Ukraine. Together with our NATO allies and international partners, the United States should continue using all diplomatic, political, and economic tools to stop further Russian aggression against the Ukrainian people.

86% of Black students take out federal student loans to pay for college — that's nearly 20 percentage points higher than white students. With a stroke of his pen, @POTUS can #CancelStudentDebt and help close the racial wealth gap.

Student debt isn't just crushing our kids. Nearly 9 million borrowers are over the age of 50 and hold more than 20% of the federal student debt. @POTUS should #CancelStudentDebt and bring millions of Americans more financial stability. Let's do this.

The lack of competition in industry after industry allows giant corporations to use inflation as cover to jack up prices for consumers.
 
They're raising prices because they can. We must fight this by breaking up monopolies and creating competition.

Sea levels are rising in coastal communities like Boston and the threat of climate change grows stronger by the day. We need to tackle this head on and that starts by passing proposals in #BuildBackBetter to make big, bold investments to fight this crisis.
https://t.co/gUPEaIDyLU
My bipartisan bill with @SteveDaines would ban Members of Congress from trading and owning stocks.

As a former teacher, I know there’s a time and place for pop quizzes — tax filing shouldn't be one.

I've got a plan to let you download your IRS data directly into your tax return. That means faster filing and faster refunds for Massachusetts families. https://t.co/XR6ZmrxXja

Prostate cancer drug Xtandi costs as much as six times more in the U.S. than it does overseas, despite being developed by U.S. taxpayer dollars. 

I'm urging @HHSGov to use its authority to dramatically lower this drug's price for Americans and stop Big Pharma's price-gouging.

Wall Street private equity firms have stripped Warrior Met @MineWorkers of their benefits, salaries & safe working conditions. I stand with workers in their fight for a fair contract.

I appreciate @SenSanders for inviting me to testify on fixing the broken private equity model. https://t.co/GFLT2fWRLQ

It's about time @federalreserve tightened up its ethics rules. For months, I've called for transparency about their scandals and plans to restore public trust, so we need to make sure these new trading guidelines have real teeth. I'll be seeking more info to make sure they work. https://t.co/oRiQjfR7kb

There's real momentum for banning Members of Congress from owning and trading individual stocks. 

It's about time we do this — and I've got a plan for that.

.@owenslindsay1 is absolutely right. Rich corporations are using inflation as a cover to pad their profit margins, while consumers are paying the price.  
 
It's time to crack down on price-gouging and bring down costs for families. https://t.co/fi3kMIv3uD

CEOs of Kroger, Tyson Foods & Chipotle are bragging to investors that inflation has been a great opportunity for them to raise prices. We have to increase competition & crack down on price-gouging. https://t.co/RqWQYGTvR4

Poultry is already one of the most concentrated industries & these giant producers use their power to price-gouge consumers. If the Sanderson-Wayne merger goes through, prices could skyrocket & farmers' pay could be cut. DOJ should take this seriously. 
https://t.co/62w4VM9rMh

This pandemic has crushed our fishing and seafood industries, which are critical to Massachusetts' economy. I fought hard to get our seafood processors $1.1M in relief from @USDA & I'll keep working to help our working waterfronts recover.
https://t.co/b57bR7L5mu

For-profit colleges have spent decades preying on working Americans who are just trying to get ahead. Millions of student borrowers were promised better jobs, but @devryuniv & other colleges lied & cheated for profits. I’m glad @usedgov is providing these borrowers with relief. https://t.co/IJHphK12BE

My bill with @SteveDaines is really straightforward: it says if you're a Member of Congress, you and your spouse cannot own, buy, or trade individual stocks. 

It's simple, direct, and it’s the only bipartisan bill in the Senate. https://t.co/ooaLmg3X6c

I look forward to joining @NewDay on @CNN soon. 

We need to ban Members of Congress from owning and trading stocks.

Hope you’ll tune in!

Senate Republicans are launching bad-faith attacks against Sarah Bloom Raskin to hold up @POTUS' extraordinarily well-qualified nominees for the Federal Reserve. We need to advance all five Fed nominees — and we need to do it now. https://t.co/8pwjUdS9Jf
Watch my speech on Republicans' attempts to hold up President Biden's @federalreserve nominees: https://t.co/Tsc8zDENgS

Dr. Califf made historic ethics commitments when he was nominated as FDA commissioner, helping to close the revolving door between government & the industries it regulates. We need strong @US_FDA leadership to help end the pandemic, strengthen public health & lower drug prices.

Since the 90s, rampant consolidation in the defense industry has reduced prime contractors from 51 to 5. 

I’ve called out the risks mega mergers pose to our economy & national security — I'm glad the Biden admin is taking steps to increase competition.
https://t.co/uqFpBRnomf

Unaffordable & unobtainable child care is stopping women from returning to work & holding back our economy. 

I have a plan to raise the wages of care workers & ensure families don’t pay more than 7% of their income on child care. The Senate must step up.
https://t.co/bjS51713kO

.@ProcterGamble executives: "Pricing has been a positive contributor to our top line."
 
“the consumer is very resilient.”
 
P&G already increased prices on baby care, detergent, dryer sheets, hair care, oral care, skincare and now touting more to come.
https://t.co/T8iBEMBg1j

.@Kroger CEO: "A little bit of inflation is always good in our business."
 
Huge grocery chains like @Kroger are using inflation as cover up to jack up consumer prices to fatten their profits.
https://t.co/tZxDPjGeI3

.@TysonFoods CEO: "we’re asking [consumers] to pay for inflation.” But Tyson didn't just pass on higher costs, it more than doubled its first quarter profits by increasing beef prices 33% & chicken prices 20%. Tyson is driving higher inflation for profit.
https://t.co/KsQaj4bAxe

Giant corporations are making record profits by increasing prices, and CEOs are saying the quiet part out loud: they’re happy to help drive inflation.
 
American families pay higher prices and corporate executives get fatter bonuses. See for yourself what executives are saying:

I have been ringing the alarm that mega mergers in our defense industry are stomping out competition and threatening national security. 

I called on @linakhanFTC to fight against more concentration and I’m glad FTC took a stand to block this deal. https://t.co/Wapcooot1B

After years of government support, @Tesla had its most profitable year ever, but it won't contribute a dime in federal taxes.

The freeloading must end — and I'm fighting to close international tax loopholes and establish a Corporate Profits Minimum Tax.
https://t.co/9qus2mroWU

It was great to be in Quincy today to announce the first installment of $2.8B in transit funding from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law. These investments will help improve reliability for commuters, bring in good union jobs, and help us tackle the #ClimateCrisis. https://t.co/Aqa03SKqDd

Wall Street firms & wealthy investors are buying up homes, jacking up rents & exacerbating inflation that’s straining family pocketbooks.

We must loosen the grip that Wall Street investors have on our housing market & pass pieces of #BuildBackBetter that make housing affordable. https://t.co/eSMXz5QXgQ

This is the deal: if you want to be in Congress, then you and your spouse can't own and trade stocks. 

This is something I've worked on for a long time. The American public has a right to count on us in Congress to be acting on their behalf, not in our own financial interests. https://t.co/yaOSSLa8zZ
.@POTUS should #CancelStudentDebt.

Our child care system is in crisis. COVID forced over 10,000 providers to close their doors, & we're still down 136,000 child care workers. I’m fighting to make sure the Administration and Congress deliver the urgent relief that child care providers and families need. https://t.co/svfEjHLLPi

I am grateful to Miniard for his dedication to housing equity throughout the Commonwealth. We have all benefited from his resilience during his career & I trust he will continue his work to improve housing and strengthen our communities.
https://t.co/AxsT9vl4zV

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, Massachusetts will receive more than $9 million to build out our electric vehicle charging stations!
 
These investments will help reduce air pollution and help fight the #ClimateCrisis, especially in underserved communities.

.@USDOL exists to protect workers & their savings — not to let big banks like @CreditSuisse off the hook for scamming investors. That's why @SenTinaSmith & I are calling on DOL to deny Credit Suisse a free pass for breaking the law.
https://t.co/VuBCt6Wdhx

For decades, big corporations have forced women to arbitration when they brought actions for sexual assault. That is repulsive. I hope this is the first step in banning compulsory arbitration practices on other issues, including racial discrimination.
https://t.co/NfSLUwaw47

My bill with @SteveDaines is simple, straightforward, and transparent. If you want to be in Congress, then you should be held to the highest standard & not own and trade any individual stocks. 
 
We've got bipartisan support & real traction here. Let's do this. https://t.co/nIQ91GzaaJ

Workers deserve good wages, strong benefits and more control over their work schedules so they can build economic security for themselves and their families. 

I'm reintroducing two bills with @rosadelauro and @janschakowsky to make that a reality.

The highly skilled workforce in Lynn has led the way in innovative manufacturing since GE’s inception. Rather than sending jobs overseas, @SenMarkey, @RepMoulton, and I are calling on @GEAviation to preserve Lynn jobs and invest in the future of America. https://t.co/V9jaYwBfhO

CEOs are bragging to investors about making record profits by raising prices.

Corporate power is an inflation problem. https://t.co/eiZVvwjCaN

SEC Chair @GaryGensler committed to release climate change disclosure rules by the end of last year. @SECGov needs to immediately release strong climate disclosure rules — not drag its feet and leave investors in the dark about climate risks facing public companies. https://t.co/KAgcNqmSvf

One clear explanation for higher inflation? Giant corporations are exploiting their market power to further raise prices. And corporate executives are bragging about their higher profits. 

We need to boost competition and break up these monopolies to bring down prices.

Four companies control over 80% of the market for hearing aids, charging people with hearing loss and older Americans up to $5,000 a pair.
 
I’ve fought for years to make hearing aids more affordable and accessible. @POTUS is helping to deliver for those in need. https://t.co/7eKmNEPqyA

Congratulations to Sasha Baker on her confirmation as Deputy Under Secretary of Defense for Policy! 
During my work on the Senate Armed Services Committee, she was by my side in Iraq, Afghanistan, China, and the DMZ. Sasha will be an incredible public servant at the Pentagon. https://t.co/TYHNLHZask

I’ve fought for years to root out corruption in Washington, and ban Members of Congress from owning and trading individual stocks. Today @SteveDaines and I proposed the first bipartisan bill in the Senate to do it. And with House partners, we have a real chance to get this done.

Secretary Raimondo’s Commerce Department should not be lobbying against EU rules to rein in Big Tech. This reported effort is a contradiction of @POTUS’ executive order to promote competition. We should break up monopolies, not protect their profits. https://t.co/yMaVPegTZE

Americans need to be confident that when Members of Congress make decisions, those decisions are based on what they believe is best for the public, not their financial interests. We need to ban Congress from owning & trading stock.

I've got a bipartisan plan for that. https://t.co/CDPOvmHs6K

In 2017, @ChuckGrassley & I passed a bipartisan bill to allow hearing aids to be sold over-the-counter. 

Now, we’re calling on the @US_FDA to finalize the rule to increase competition, bring down prices, and meet high standards for safety & manufacturing protections.
I’ll be on @MSNBC soon to talk about my new bipartisan bill to ban Members of Congress from owning and trading stocks. Hope you’ll tune in!

The historic settlement against @Navient for abusing student loan borrowers was a major step toward accountability. Yet many borrowers aren't eligible for the relief. @SecCardona should take action to help everyone cheated by Navient's predatory practices. https://t.co/zZXFA1reYb

Corporate CEOs engaging in price-fixing should be prosecuted for exploiting consumers. 

As we fight inflation, I'm calling on @TheJusticeDept to take aggressive action to enforce antitrust laws to help lower prices for Americans. 
https://t.co/B41YGAEeGW

The system is broken — we cannot accept the deaths of innocent civilians as an unavoidable cost of warfare. The Pentagon must make long-overdue changes to meaningfully protect civilian lives. https://t.co/Zi1CICQZ7M

Private equity firms too often prey on companies like @PetSmart with leveraged buyouts that lead to severe cost cutting for a quick payout — harming workers & endangering pets.

BC Partners’ latest deal raises alarms, & I’m watching to make sure workers & pets are protected. https://t.co/wBJDGG4Gc2

Ray was a friend and fearless advocate who inspired many, including me, to get more engaged in our democracy. When I first started in politics, he & his wife Donna were among my first supporters. My heart goes out to his family & the Springfield community. https://t.co/H2tipzxMyp

Tyson is abusing their corporate market power and raking in record profits by jacking up meat prices. 

I’ve long argued that we need to enforce our antitrust laws to break up monopolies and promote competition, and now it’s more vital than ever as a tool to fight inflation. https://t.co/KIbMUbM6B4

More evidence that @WellsFargo has had way too many chances to cheat the American people. 

As I’ve said before, it’s time to break up this big bank.
https://t.co/38Qds8dkJa
Billionaire corporations have gotten away with cheating the tax system for too long. My 15% Corporate Profits Minimum Tax in #BuildBackBetter would make sure they pay their fair share.

The Public Service Loan Forgiveness program is finally delivering on its promise to forgive student debt for thousands of doctors, nurses, teachers, and other public servants.
 
Now, @POTUS needs to keep making progress and #CancelStudentDebt.
https://t.co/NGL8TjxHOs

We've got to close tax loopholes that allow the ultra-rich to keep getting richer but then pay next to nothing in taxes. 

It's time for a #WealthTax to make our system fairer. https://t.co/pbTHYPVoNJ

Despite the record job creation this past year, the child care sector is still down more than 130,000 jobs since the pandemic began. 

We've got to pass the child care policies in #BuildBackBetter — creating better paying child care jobs and helping parents get back to work.

The House passed the COMPETES Act to help fix our supply chains and invest in American manufacturing — fighting inflation while creating jobs. I’m going to work hard to advance the pro-worker improvements in this bill and send the strongest legislation to @POTUS’s desk.

The U.S. economy has created 6.6 million jobs over the last year. 

That’s more jobs during President Biden’s first year in office than the first years of the past four Republican presidents COMBINED.
I support the efforts of Congressional staff to start and join a union. Everyone deserves the right to organize for higher pay, better benefits, and strong workplace protections.

.@Netflix made over $5 BILLION in profits last year & only paid 1% in federal taxes.
 
Everyone loves binge-watching their favorite shows, but no one loves paying a higher tax rate than a billionaire corporation. My Corporate Profits Minimum Tax will help fix this broken system. https://t.co/nTVvEmuqKI

I fought hard, working side by side with the Massachusetts delegation, to secure $1 billion in federal funding for the Green Line Extension.

When the new extension opens, the GLX will increase transit options for residents and help us fight climate change.https://t.co/CABilVh9pf

Women and people of color are more likely to have student debt and are stuck with it for longer. 

Cancelling student debt would help close these gaps and give everyone a fair shot at their future. It's time for @POTUS to act.
https://t.co/sY1hKR4kEE

We need to pass the tax reforms in #BuildBackBetter: my 15% Corporate Profits Minimum Tax so giant corporations pay their fair share & IRS funding to catch wealthy tax cheats. We also need to make sure billionaires pay taxes each year like everyone else. Let's get this done. https://t.co/6ZYz0z5p2o

Glad to work with @BillPascrell, @SenJeffMerkley, and @SenMarkey to introduce the Political CRIMES Act to rebuild public trust in government, strengthen the Hatch Act and punish those who break laws. https://t.co/r9n2aR9rRY

US servicemembers and taxpayers should know if billions of dollars of weapons are working as intended. For 40 years, @DeptofDefense submitted an unclassified report to Congress, but now the Pentagon's restricting access. This decision should be reversed. https://t.co/nhus0XkNfp

In industry after industry, research shows that monopoly power leads to higher prices — and the pharmaceutical industry is no exception. 

We need to lower drug prices by passing #BuildBackBetter, strengthening antitrust enforcement, and ending scams that limit competition. https://t.co/eGTL411RFO

I’m hosting a Senate Finance Subcommittee hearing focused on how Congress can protect Medicare and expand coverage for Americans by cracking down on corporate greed. Hope you'll tune in! https://t.co/3SVEWNagpB

Americans are already paying record prices for chicken. Meanwhile, big poultry companies use their power to hurt consumers with price fixing to pad their bottom line. Preventing massive consolidation in the poultry industry will lower costs for Americans.
https://t.co/80mWCDPDdv

Student debt cancellation is a front-page issue. 

The student loan payment pause has given millions some relief from the crushing burden of student debt. @POTUS should #CancelStudentDebt and make that a permanent reality. https://t.co/V4ciEpUtoQ

The racist comments and violent threats against @MayorWu are unacceptable and must stop. I stand with @RepPressley and Boston’s elected officials calling for an end to this dangerous behavior. https://t.co/3loXYHsgD8

Gold Star families make incredible sacrifices for our country. Today, @SenJoniErnst and I introduced the Gold Star Families Day Act to dedicate a federal holiday in recognition of families who have lost a loved one while they served in the military.
https://t.co/ak7GErhABp

The fastest economic growth since 1984. 

That's because Democrats are hard at work for the American people. https://t.co/aCiQRF9BEv

Wishing all those celebrating a very happy Lunar New Year! 

May the #YearOfTheTiger bring families good health, prosperity, and happiness!

#BlackHistoryMonth is a time to honor the invaluable contributions of Black Americans who've shaped every part of our nation.
 
We also reflect and recommit to the long fight against systemic racism and for equal justice. This work is far from over, and I'm in it all the way.

This is corruption, plain & simple. Randall Quarles was a high-level policymaker at the @Federalreserve just a few months ago, but now he's back to work at his private equity firm in the financial sector.

We need to slam shut this revolving door & I've got a bill to get it done. https://t.co/2vmGm9cDAg

Ending this pandemic requires getting more vaccines to people around the world. More than 90% of people in low-income countries haven’t received even one COVID vaccine dose. 

I’m pushing for the U.S. and the IMF to do more to fight the virus worldwide.
https://t.co/cX3uhqi5F4

How do we expand health care access, fix our child care system, & make investments to fight climate change?
 
We make sure giant corporations stop cheating the system & pay their fair share in taxes. My 15% Corporate Profits Minimum Tax would do just that.

Child care workers are struggling more than ever. We've got to pass the proposals in #BuildBackBetter to make bold investments in quality, affordable child care and raise the wages of child care workers in America.
https://t.co/8QhrGlOIo0

Because the GOP gutted the IRS budget, hardworking Americans can't get help with their taxes and the top 1% gets away with tax cheating.
 
I'm calling for $80 billion in IRS funding so it can go after tax cheats and provide services that Americans need. https://t.co/8mrI1bNiib

Billionaires got $5 TRILLION richer last year. So don't tell me they can't afford to pay yearly taxes on their wealth and contribute to transformative investments in child care, health care, and clean energy.

It's time for a #WealthTax. https://t.co/UN3yJIXNNy

Bitcoin mining's energy use has more than tripled since 2019, consuming as much energy as entire countries. It's even driving up electricity costs and harming local environments.
 
I want six cryptomining companies to provide answers on their impact.
https://t.co/FmRlC65C8o

I've long called for reform to prevent civilian casualties and I'm glad the Biden admin recognizes that change is urgently needed. Civilian casualties are a moral stain and national security liability and we must do everything we can to prevent them.
https://t.co/64AaoFNFL5

Remember the economic growth that Donald Trump promised but failed to deliver?
 
With President Biden, we now have the fastest economic growth since 1984.

On #HolocaustRemembranceDay, we honor the victims and survivors of one of the gravest crimes against humanity. But words alone are not enough—we must push back against the rise of anti-Semitism and stand in solidarity against hate.

I introduced the Climate Risk Disclosure Act to mitigate the threat of climate change to our financial system & I'm glad the President is in this fight. His executive order on climate related financial risks is a great step to address the threat of climate change on our economy. https://t.co/inoFuYeu71

Corporate lobbyists and anti-tax extremists have championed IRS budget cuts for years. That means a free pass for wealthy tax cheats and inadequate assistance to Americans just trying to honestly file their taxes. I’m calling for increased IRS funding.
https://t.co/8mrI1bNiib

The child tax credit — expanded in the American Rescue Plan — helped parents afford basic necessities. Electricity. Groceries. Asthma medication.
 
Families are counting on these monthly payments to make ends meet. I’m fighting to extend this tax cut.
https://t.co/jYt8E8TtPS

The faster we ramp up the distribution and manufacturing of vaccines around the globe, the sooner we can end this pandemic.
 
That's why I'm calling for an additional $17 billion in funding to boost the global COVID-19 response.
https://t.co/TgzsalXikY

Justice Breyer has been an extraordinary public servant. He's done important opinions, from protecting abortion rights to preserving the Affordable Care Act. 

I'm delighted that @POTUS will stand by his pledge to nominate a Black woman to the Supreme Court. https://t.co/rif9WbQaWT

It's been nearly a year since President Biden asked @usedgov to review his authority to cancel student debt by executive action — but they haven't released the memo. 

We know @POTUS has the authority to #CancelStudentDebt and it's time for him to act.
https://t.co/wXvgGLtKYL

Thanks to President Biden and the @FTC's efforts to promote competition, companies like @Apple and @Microsoft can no longer pad their profits by stopping consumers from repairing their own devices.

Common sense action to save people money. 
https://t.co/VSyOLTzzYv

I graduated from a state school that cost $50 a semester. Today, I'm in this fight because I want every young person in America to have an opportunity like I had — a chance to get the education they need without getting crushed by student loan debt.

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, an additional $100 million will be allocated to help low-income families across the country pay for their heating and electricity bills.

Bill Owens blazed a trail as the first Black state Senator in MA and in his fight for economic and racial justice. His legacy persists in our continued work to dismantle structural racism in all of its forms. My thoughts are with his family and loved ones. https://t.co/4Q3i0uacc0

The Tongass National Forest is a national treasure and home to Alaska Native communities who rely on these undisturbed lands. I support @FTC taking aggressive action to oppose corporate concentration in the defense industry that could threaten national security. I raised concerns about this merger, and I’m glad the FTC’s lawsuit to block @LockheedMartin's acquisition has unanimous, bipartisan support. https://t.co/dY7x6sYZxO

Right now, millions of restaurants and small neighborhood businesses are struggling to keep their doors open. 

I spoke with restaurant owners and @MARestosUnited about how I'm fighting for Congress to replenish the Restaurant Revitalization Fund. https://t.co/ow1ikqGc7p

Giant oil and gas corporations want the Supreme Court to do their dirty work and strip away environmental protections. I’m fighting alongside @SenWhitehouse to overcome this corruption. We must call out when the Court is being used as a political tool for special interests. https://t.co/gtPATbCefU

In highly consolidated industries, huge corporations can use their market power to raise prices for consumers while fattening their profit margins. I support President Biden's efforts to take on inflation, increase market competition, and bring costs down.
https://t.co/rp9CMXajU5

A 2-cent #WealthTax on America's ultra-rich would raise hundreds of billions in revenue each year. That’s money we could invest in American families, from fixing our broken child care system to expanding child tax credits. Let’s keep fighting for this. 
https://t.co/JwrelJNgTY

Before this pandemic our child care system was broken—and COVID-19 has only made things worse. Proposals in #BuildBackBetter would fix the broken child care system and ensure all parents can access quality, affordable child care. We have to get this done.
https://t.co/ife6kZmich

What happened to Warrior Met workers is a classic example of what happens when private equity firms come to town: They strip companies to line their pockets at the expense of workers. I'm with @MineWorkers in their fight for better pay and work conditions.
https://t.co/y9YLe3Xlmt

.@POTUS has already cancelled $15B in federal student loans since taking office. It’s time for him to use his authority to #CancelStudentDebt for the 43 million borrowers who remain in debt. Helping these borrowers is the right thing to do.
https://t.co/n00dl0T3ug

Local government is where the rubber hits the road, and I'm proud to be your partner. Thanks to the new infrastructure law, much needed investment in bridges, highways, school busses, public transit, clean water, and more is coming to communities across Massachusetts. https://t.co/5jgfDJJh1o

I grew up in an America where abortions were illegal, but those with resources still got them. #RoeVWade saved lives and helped millions take control of their future. 

We can't let Republicans turn back the clock. We need to pass #WHPA and codify Roe.

Nearly $200 million is being delivered to help college students at risk of losing housing or going hungry during this pandemic. We should pass my Student Food Security Act to help students meet their basic needs while trying to get through college. https://t.co/xx0WOBm6C5

Bringing back manufacturing jobs to America to drive down prices! I've called for more investment in the U.S. semiconductor industry to lower the prices of cars and consumer goods. Giant corporations with market power are using inflation as cover to jack up consumer prices even more. 

We need to start enforcing antitrust laws to break up monopolies, restore competition, and bring prices down for hardworking families.

I'm glad that @Chopracfpb is spending his 100th day at the @CFPB by cracking down on for-profit colleges that cheat student borrowers. For-profit colleges have gotten away with predatory practices for a long time, so let's keep their feet to the fire.

This is outrageous. We need a #WealthTax.
https://t.co/X7Vm7VVt6p

The pause on student loan payments has given borrowers room to breathe, but this isn't over yet. The next step for @POTUS is to use his existing authority to #CancelStudentDebt. Making student debt relief permanent is the right thing to do.

History teaches us that progress is never one and done. Senators committed to democracy for all Americans have faced setbacks on the filibuster before, only to eventually overcome and win.
 
Our fight to protect voting rights and defend our democracy is far from over.

Freedom to Vote: John Lewis Voting Rights Act will:

✅Guarantee every American citizen can vote & have their vote counted
✅Reform our broken campaign finance system & root out dark money
✅Ban partisan gerrymandering by either side

End the filibuster. Protect voting rights.
